name: get_absence_types_for_employee
description: Get the absence type IDs, and Employer IDs which are available in Oracle HCM for a particular employee. This data is used during projection of employee absence balances.

outputSchema.description: Array of absence types associated with the employee.

AbsenceTypeId.description: The unique identifier for the absence type.

EmployerId.description: The unique identifier for the employer associated with the absence type.

AbsenceTypeName.description: The name of the absence type.

name: get_all_absence_balances_for_employee
description: Get all available absence balances for a particular employee (the balances are based off a system calculation date, and not projected balances).

outputSchema.description: Array of absence balances associated with the employee.

planName.description: The name of the absence plan.

carryOver.description: Indicates if the balance can be carried over.

planStatus.description: Whether the plan is active or inactive.

formattedBalance.description: The formatted balance value in hours.

balanceCalculationDate.description: The date when the balance was calculated by the system in DD-MM-YYYY format.

name: get_projected_balance
description: Get projected balance as well as a projection date/effective date in DD-MM-YYYY format (Balance As Of Date), for a particular AbsenceTypeId

inputSchema.description: Input schema for projected balance request.

AbsenceTypeId.description: The unique identifier for the absence type.

endDate.description: The end date for the projection in DD-MM-YYYY format.

absenceTypeId.description: The unique identifier for the absence type.

projectedBalance.description: The projected balance value in hours.
